channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: New: flake8-pytest-importorskip (1.post0)
item.description: Make pycodestyle treat pytest.importorskip as an import statement (avoid E402)
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-adjustable-complexity (0.0.4)
item.description: A flake8 extension that checks cyclomatic complexity and calculates max complexity limit in runtime
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-encodings (0.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: wemake-python-styleguide (0.15.1)
item.description: The strictest and most opinionated python linter ever
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-helper (0.1.1)
item.description: A helper library for Flake8 plugins.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-codes (0.1.1)
item.description: CLI tool to introspect flake8 plugins and their codes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-safegraph-crawl (0.4)
item.description: Flake8 plugin enforcing code requirements for SafeGraph crawlers

item.title: Updated: wemake-python-styleguide (0.15)

item.title: New: flake8-safegraph-crawl (0.1)

item.title: Updated: darglint (1.6)

item.title: Updated: flake8-strftime (0.2.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin which checks for use of platform specific strftime codes.

item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.

item.title: Updated: flake8-jira-todo-checker (0.5.1)
